description: Budget 2024: India aims for 500 GW renewable energy by 2030, with Sitharaman's July 23 budget detailing measures under Modi 3.0. Ranking 4th globally, India seeks a 45% carbon intensity reduction by 2030. Key initiatives include transnational grid, FAME 3.0, 600k skilled workers, GST concessions, PPP solar projects, addressing copper costs, RBI financing draft, overseas training, poaching, and sustainability incentives.
